title: The Overparenting Problem
teaser: We’ve been hearing about ‘helicopter parents’ for a while now, but what causes parents to cross the line between nurturing to smothering? And what’s wrong with careful, attentive parenting, anyway? Joy Cardin talks to a guest author about the roots of the overparenting epidemic and what solutions he sees.
